did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Virginia Cemetery Board,

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Cemetery Board was established by law July 1, 1998. The seven member board authorizes the licensure of persons engaged in the "business of a cemetery company" as cited in section 54.1-2311 Code of Virginia. The requirements for licensure became effective in legislation on July 1, 2000.

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

accessrestrict.p: Meeting attachments must be reviewed for personal information and redacted prior to serving.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Cemetery Board, Minutes, [cite specific date and accession used], State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 42986 was transferred by Borkey, Alexina, M., Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation, 11/27/2006

scopecontent.p: Official minutes, agendas and related attachments documenting the activities of the Virginia Cemetery Board. May also include informal fact finding conference records and conflict of interest statements.
